segments.text: I'm growing increasingly concerned about that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems so precarious, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are tilted and splayed, a clear sign of instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the wobble from here, imagining the crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, his little body vulnerable to a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is covered in water from the sink overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall onto that wet surface would be even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope he doesn't get hurt in his quest for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing nearby doesn't seem to notice the danger either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on the cookies, not the wobbly support.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really ought to stabilize that stool or get him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frightening situation, waiting for the inevitable tip.
segments.speaker: PAR
